attributes.comment: Apex Data Solutions, LLC (“Apex”) appreciates the opportunity to respond to the Request for Information (“RFI”) CMS-0058-NC from the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (“CMS”) related to a National Directory of Healthcare Providers and Services.  Input is being sought on the concept of CMS creating a directory with information on healthcare providers and services or a “National Directory of Healthcare Providers and Services” (NDH) to serve as a centralized data hub for healthcare provider, facility, and entity directory information nationwide.  Apex would recommend against the establishment of an NDH at this time for a number of reasons, which are outlined in the attached document.
